title: Karlach
tags: where to find karlach in bg3
how to romance karlach in bg3
content: rap.) Cursebreaker (Discover the curse of Yeenoghu and destroy his hyenas.) Eyes Of The Wild (See past the illusion covering the swamp.) Cub Tamer (Successfully tame the owlbear cub.) A Noble Endeavor (Effectively use a noblestalk mushroom.) Abyss Jumper (Enter the Underdark through the bottomless well.) Clever Cuckoo (Steal from the giant bird's nest in the Underdark.) Mushroom Enthusiast (Destroy each kind of hazardous Underdark mushroom.) Nest Egg (Take an item from the Carrion Crawler nest.)
